means: 向…提供错误的消息，误导

sentence.Network_en: Don ＇ t misinform your doctor nor your lawyer.
sentence.Network_cn: 别向医生和律师提供错误的消息.

sentence.Network_en: Don't misinform your doctor or your lawyer.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要向医生和律师提供错误的信息.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 填空hunting大队绿皮书讲解 exercise 7... ... confused： 困惑的 misinformed： 被误导的 fanatical： 狂热的.

GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... misgiving 担心，疑虑 misinform 向…提供错误信息 misnomer 名字的误用.
马克吐温说过：「不看报纸会孤陋无知 （ill informed），看报纸又受到误传误导（misinformed）。」当今的媒体，花样繁多，除报纸 …

list.abs: misinformation... ... fraudulent misinformation 恶意误报 misinformation effect 误导信息效应 distort misinformation 误报.
I guess I was totally misinformed when I learned about the birds and the bees ., 我猜我是完全错误的时候 , 我了解了鸟类和蜜蜂.
One method of spreading misinformation is the double agent ., 散布假情报的一种方法是双重间谍.
I guess I was totally misinformed when I learned about the birds and the bees ., 我猜我是完全错误的时候 , 我了解了鸟类和蜜蜂.

entry.def: If you are misinformed, you are told something that is wrong or inaccurate.

example.ex: He has been misinformed by members of his own party...
example.tran: 他从自己党内成员那里得到了错误的消息。
显然我们得到的消息是错误的。

means.word_mean: 1. give false or misleading information to

auth_sentence.content: There was absolutely no intent to misinform.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was absolutely no intent to misinform.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was absolutely no intent to misinform.

auth_sentence.content: Nevertheless, teachers continue to misinform their students that cursive is faster.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nevertheless, teachers continue to misinform their students that cursive is faster.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nevertheless, teachers continue to misinform their students that cursive is faster.

auth_sentence.content: But Amar and Tribe misinform their readers when they claim that it must do so.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Amar and Tribe misinform their readers when they claim that it must do so.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Amar and Tribe misinform their readers when they claim that it must do so.

means.word_mean: 向…提供错误的消息,误导

sentences.en: It became clear that the general had been badly misinformed.
sentences.cn: 已经很清楚，将军得到的情报是严重失实的。

sentences.en: I didn’t mean to answer back,I merely meant to say that you had been misinformed.
sentences.cn: 我并不想跟你顶嘴,我只是想说你听到的话是搞错了。

sentences.en: The parents had been misinformed about the incident.
sentences.cn: 有人向这对父母误报了那件事。
